headline: Agoda Spotlights Central Asia as Rising Travel Destination for South Korean Travelers
summary: With domestic and foreign airlines expanding flight options to Central Asia, the region is capturing the attention of South Korean travelers. Digital travel platform Agoda revealed that, based on accommodation searches made by South Korean travelers from January to October this year, search volume for four key Central Asian countries — Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, and Tajikistan — has increased by 225% compared to the same period last year.
